author: Wollfie Art
text:
I move around a lot and have had many dentists. Dr. Melissa Quellhorst is the best dentist that I have been too. She is knowledgeable, straightforward and kind. The care that she and her staff give is superb.
Amelia

author: Mary
text: Dr. Valerie is an excellent, and very personable dentist who truly cares about whatâ€™s best for her patients! She did an excellent job with my fillings. She made sure I was very comfortable and addressed my anxiety and all of my concerns. I had no pain at all during or after the procedures. I would highly recommend and trust Dr.  Valerie, and the staff at Cross Creeks Dental, for all your dental needs!

author: Gwen Rader
text: The dentist and the team provided a thorough explanation of the procedures, treatment alternatives, and associated costs, making sure I was fully informed and engaged in my oral health choices. I am extremely satisfied to be a patient at Cross Creek Dental. I sincerely appreciate everyone for contributing to such a positive dental experience during my recent visit to your office.

author: Stefan Wheeler
text: The staff was very helpful and very informative they made my visit very pleasant easy and relaxing. They came up with a game plan and discussed everything in great detail and what I needed and what to expect from them from start to finish. I HIGHLY recommend Cross Creek Dental
